content:
Configure, navigate, and reprice complex quotes with multi-level insured item relationships and coverages with Vlocity Insurance multi-root quoting.

Create a New Commercial Quote: use a quote to estimate the cost of a commercial policy by adding multiple products.

Configure a Commercial Quote: customize a quote to provide customers with specific coverage needs.

Additional Actions:

Quote Rating: rate quotes as needed, running optional validation rules and displaying a price for coverage.

Quote Versioning: create and compare quote versions from a Quote record.

Quote Record Types: use the Type field on the Quote Details tab to differentiate between new business and endorsement quotes.

Issue a Policy from a Commercial Quote: issue a commercial policy directly from a quote using the Issue Policy button.

Optional Coverage Rules for Quoting: run rules when making changes to insured items, parties, or coverages on the Quote UI.

Commissions for Quoting: use various commission calculations for individual agents and products in different time periods, triggering calculations at specific events.

After configuring the quote and issuing policies, view and modify them on the Policy (Asset) record.
title: Configuring Multi-Root Quoting in Salesforce Insurance
